channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Klarna rival Zilch posts first profit and appoints ex-Aviva CEO to board ahead of IPO
item.description: Philip Belamant, Zilch's CEO, told CNBC the firm was able to hit profitability by growing rather than cutting back like other fintechs have done.

item.title: This multi-billion-dollar company saw its stock price drop 98%
Tuesday's analyst calls: Ferrari to jump 20%, Boeing downgraded to sell
item.description: A luxury car maker and an aerospace giant were among the stocks being talked about by analysts on Tuesday.

item.title: Broadcom highlights this week’s earnings slate as investors assess AI landscape
Starlink in Brazil's crosshairs as spat over Elon Musk's X escalates
item.description: The confrontation between Brazil and Musk continues to escalate over the country's decision to block his social media company X.

item.title: 4 money moves to make before the Federal Reserve lowers interest rates
